hero.name: Lucca Fucci,
hero.description:
Passionate about code,
giving life to amazing experiences.

about.title: Who am I?
about.description: I am a developer with a degree in Film and a passion for the art of digital experience. I love art and development and I think the two go hand in hand.

projectList.name: nbk Pulse
projectList.description: Marketing management and social media administration platform focused on restaurants, fully integrated with Instagram, WhatsApp and AI tools. Built with Vite, React, Node, Tailwind CSS, AWS, GCR and Docker.

projectList.name: Filmic
projectList.description: Windows application for organizing, cataloging and playing movies with an elegant and modern interface, which finds thumbnails using ffmpeg and automatically integrates with the TMDB API for information. Built with Electron, React, Node.js and Github Releases.
